name: Live☆Twin Home
text:
Discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Ki-sikil" monster or 1 "Lil-la" monster from your Deck, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Evil★Twin" monsters.
You can only activate 1 "Live☆Twin Home" per turn.
